FuncDef:
The bfr-id command configures a unique BFR-ID for an edge BIER device in a BIER subdomain.
The undo bfr-id command restores the default configuration.
By default, no BFR-id is configured for an edge BIER device.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a BFR-ID.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 65535.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To configure a unique BFR-ID for an edge BIER device in a BIER subdomain, run the bfr-id command.
Prerequisites
A BIER subdomain has been configured using the sub-domain command.
